title: three-dragons.
description: A WebGL implementation of the three dragons board game.

title: match-the-tiles.
description: Implementation of the match the tiles game.
Developed to show the execution of classic shortest path and reinforcement learning algorithms.
In single player mode, the user can try to solve the puzzle accessing hints calculated by the algorithms.
In AI mode, it is possible to visualise an agent solving the puzzle.

title: inclusive.
description: Allows to draw annotations on a whiteboard or on top of images, videos or screen sharings.
Also includes speech-to-text and background removal when recording.
